segments.text: I notice the woman drying dishes, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to notice the water pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she’s just standing there like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like a little thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, and it’s kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, but no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is chaotic, but it’s also kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I doubt it.
segments.speaker: PAR
